alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Dawson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 7:12PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Buffalo and northeastern Dawson Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 712 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Eddyville to near Sumner. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Miller around 730 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Amherst. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
